personal.name: Md Al Imran Shikdar
personal.title: Software Engineer in Test | Manual & Automation Testing
personal.summary: Experienced Software Engineer in Test with 3+ years of experience in manual testing across fintech and media asset management platforms. Proven track record in ensuring software quality, identifying critical bugs, and improving testing processes. Currently expanding skills in test automation with Playwright and TypeScript. Seeking opportunities to leverage both manual testing expertise and emerging automation skills in quality assurance roles.
personal.aboutSummary: Software Engineer in Test with 3+ years of experience specializing in manual testing for fintech and media asset management systems. Passionate about ensuring software quality and reliability through comprehensive testing strategies. Currently learning test automation with Playwright and TypeScript to enhance testing capabilities. Open to remote work and relocation opportunities. Let's connect if you're passionate about quality assurance, testing methodologies, or enjoy discussing tech innovations! ðŸ’»

projects.title: Media Asset Management Testing
projects.description: Comprehensive testing of media asset management systems including file upload/download functionality, metadata management, user permissions, and media processing workflows.

projects.title: Fintech Application Testing
projects.description: Manual testing of fintech applications focusing on payment processing, transaction validation, security testing, and compliance verification. Ensured robust financial data handling and user experience.

projects.title: bKash Livechat Testing
projects.description: Comprehensive testing of bKash live chat system ensuring seamless customer support functionality. Successfully tested live chat integration with minimal production issues and conducted thorough regression testing to maintain system reliability.

projects.title: Test Case Project
projects.description: Comprehensive manual testing project involving test case creation, execution, and reporting. Created detailed test case reports, test metrics analysis, bug reports, and mind maps for better test coverage visualization.

projects.title: API Testing Project
projects.description: End-to-end API testing project implementing CRUD operations testing with comprehensive data validation, random string generation, integer validation, and API response verification using Postman and Newman.

projects.title: WebAutomation Project (Selenium with JAVA)
projects.description: Automated web testing framework using Selenium WebDriver with Java. Implemented test cases for URL navigation, element assertions, dropdown interactions, form validations, and cross-browser compatibility testing.

projects.title: WebAutomation Project (Cypress)
projects.description: Modern web automation testing suite using Cypress framework. Developed automated test cases for checkbox interactions, dropdown selections, assertions, form submissions, and end-to-end user journey testing.

workExperience.subtitle: Client: Mimir (Enterprise Media Asset Management Platform)

Monitor AWS Code Pipeline for continuous integration and deployment processes
Monitor GitHub planning board for available pull requests to test
Collaborate with development teams to ensure quality deliverables
Execute comprehensive testing strategies for enterprise-level applications

workExperience.subtitle: bKash Projects
workExperience.description: Associate Software QA Engineer responsible for testing bKash projects and ensuring quality delivery of critical fintech applications.

Estimated project timelines and aligned requirements with cross-functional teams
Conducted extensive regression testing and documented detailed results
Tested various APIs and actively participated in deployment sessions
Successfully tested bKash live chat with minimal production issues
Identified and reported critical bugs in the bKash VFCP payment system
Led project delivery sessions for bKash live chat implementation
Ensured quality standards for high-traffic fintech applications

workExperience.subtitle: Client: SalesType CRM Software
workExperience.description: Junior Software QA Engineer responsible for comprehensive testing of SalesType CRM software and performance optimization initiatives.
achievements: Performed thorough manual testing of SalesType CRM software modules
Executed performance testing using JMeter and comprehensive API testing with Postman
Achieved exceptional quality with less than 5% bug leakage across various modules
Developed and maintained test documentation and reporting processes
Collaborated with development teams to ensure timely bug resolution

workExperience.subtitle: Client: Walton Digi-Tech
workExperience.description: SQA Engineer Intern gaining comprehensive hands-on experience in software quality assurance methodologies and mobile device testing.
achievements: Gained foundational understanding of device testing methodologies and wrote comprehensive test cases
Conducted systematic regression testing and submitted detailed bug reports
Developed mobile UI automation testing frameworks and executed performance testing
Learned industry-standard testing tools and best practices
Contributed to quality assurance processes for consumer electronics
